content.en: Interconnection Network Analysis: Researchers have investigated various interconnection networks for massively parallel systems and compared their advantages. Algorithms have been developed to optimize routing and broadcasting in star-connected cycles (SCC), emulate star graph algorithms on macro-star networks, and evaluate the performance of the recursive diagonal torus (RDT) network. Other studies have focused on properties and advantages of different networks, such as the Josephus Cube, extended star graphs, hierarchical star networks, Tori connected Torus Network (TTN), Metacube networks, triangular pyramid networks, three-dimensional Petersen-torus networks, Hierarchical Tori connected Mesh Network (HTM), and twisted crossed cube networks. These algorithms and evaluations help researchers understand the capabilities and performance characteristics of these interconnection networks.
content.da: Interconnection Network Analysis: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige interconnect-netværk for massivt parallelle systemer og sammenlignet deres fordele. Algoritmer er blevet udviklet til at optimere routing og broadcasting i stjerneforbundne cykler (SCC), efterligne stjernegrafalgoritmer på makrostjernenetværk og evaluere ydeevnen for det rekursive diagonale torus (RDT) netværk. Andre studier har fokuseret på egenskaber og fordele ved forskellige netværk, såsom Josephus Cube, udvidede stjernegrafer, hierarkiske stjernenetværk, Tori forbundne Torus Netværk (TTN), Metacube-netværk, trekantede pyramidnetværk, tredimensionale Petersen-torusnetværk, Hierarchical Tori connected Mesh Network (HTM) og snoede krydskubsnetværk. Disse algoritmer og evalueringer hjælper forskere med at forstå kapaciteterne og ydeevneegenskaberne for disse interconnect-netværk.
